docs.abstract: International Bobsleigh and Skeleton Assn will move its 2017 world championship events out of Sochi, Russia to another location; group cites desire to avoid potential boycotts and controversy following release of report detailing extensive system of state-sponsored doping by Russia, including at 2014 Sochi games.
